Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

params.reward: : amount to be distributed over applicable rewards duration

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

returns._0: amount of tokens staked by account

constructor.details: owner set to address that deployed StakingRewards

params._rewardEscrow: : escrow contract which holds (and may stake) reward tokens
params._token: : token used for staking and for rewards

params.account: : address of account earned amount is being calculated for
address to check the escrowed tokens staked

getReward().details: rewards are escrowed in RewardEscrowupdateReward() called prior to function logic

returns._0: rewards for the duration specified by rewardsDuration
timestamp of the last time rewards are applicable

params.account: address to check the non-escrowed tokens staked

notifyRewardAmount(uint256).details: updateReward() called prior to function logic (with zero address)

params.reward: : amount of token to be distributed over a period

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.tokenAddress: : address of token to be recovered
params.tokenAmount: : amount of token to be recovered

returns._0: running sum of reward per total tokens staked

stake(uint256).details: updateReward() called prior to function logic

stakeEscrow(address,uint256).details: updateReward() called prior to function logicmsg.sender NOT used (account is used)

totalSupply().details: returns staked tokens which will likely not be equal to total tokens in the contract since reward and staking tokens are the same

returns._0: total amount of tokens that are being staked

unstake(uint256).details: updateReward() called prior to function logic

unstakeEscrow(address,uint256).details: updateReward() called prior to function logicmsg.sender NOT used (account is used)

EscrowUnstaked(address,uint256).notice: emitted when staked escrow tokens are unstaked

Recovered(address,uint256).notice: emitted when tokens are recovered from this contract

earned(address).notice: determine how much reward token an account has earned thus far

escrowedBalanceOf(address).notice: Getter function for number of staked escrow tokens

exit().notice: unstake all available staked non-escrowed tokens and claim any rewards

getReward().notice: caller claims any rewards generated from staking

lastUpdateTime().notice: track last time the rewards were updated

nonEscrowedBalanceOf(address).notice: Getter function for number of staked non-escrow tokens

periodFinish().notice: marks applicable reward period finish time

recoverERC20(address,uint256).notice: added to support recovering LP Rewards from other systems such as BAL to be distributed to holders

rewardEscrow().notice: escrow contract which holds (and may stake) reward tokens

rewardPerToken().notice: calculate running sum of reward per total tokens staked at this specific time

rewardPerTokenStored().notice: summation of rewardRate divided by total staked tokens

rewardRate().notice: amount of tokens minted per second

rewards(address).notice: track rewards for a given user which changes when a user stakes, unstakes, or claims rewards

token().notice: token used for BOTH staking and rewards

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address).notice: represents the rewardPerToken value the last time the stake calculated earned() rewards

userdoc.notice: Updated version of Synthetix's StakingRewards with new features specific to DexToro
